name: Re-Imagine Europa
goal:
Re-Imagine Europa A.I.S.B.L. is the first European incubator for political ideas that uses innovative internet communication technologies (ICTs) to better deal with the most pressing issues of our time focussing on ensuring Europeâ€™s role as a leading economic power in the XXI Century.

Re-Imagine Europa wants to redefine how long-term policy and vision is developed through the use of new technologies to foster a dynamic public discourse, collective intelligence and realistic solutions for the benefit of a stronger, fairer and more competitive Europe.
interests: Communication, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives:
For the launch and first year of activity RIE will focus on the following issues:
-A Fairer and More Competitive Economic Model for Europe.
- Democracy in a Post-Truth Society

Both these themes are cross-cutting and engages with many of the EU initiatives looking at the future of EU society including: innovation agenda, digital agenda, new technologies, open government, fiscal union, etc.
